Biesterfeld, a German prince and member of the Dutch royal family. The first

meeting took place at the Hotel de Bilderberg in Oosterbeek, Netherlands,

from May 29 to 31, 1954 (url website). This inaugural gathering brought

together approximately 40 individuals from Europe and North America,

including politicians, industrialists, journalists, and academics.
